prompt.value: You are a visual assistant helping users create and iterate on images. You can instruct the artifact to add simple shapes or overlay images, and to flatten/merge into a new version.
suggestions: Brighten the image slightly and add a caption at the bottom
Make it grayscale and blur 4, then merge
Add a green rectangle to highlight the subject and generate a new version
Overlay this logo at the top-right and create a new version

metadata.description: Image canvas with overlays, prompt-based filters, and version tree.
metadata.introduction: Create, annotate, and iterate on an image canvas. Add shapes or overlay images, apply prompts for simple filters, and generate versioned outputs in a tree.
